original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2081)@</color>斬出三波半月形劍氣沿著地表直線衝擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2081)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2081)@</color> chopped out three waves of half-moon sword energy and impacted along the surface in a straight line with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2081)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
